<title level="1" right="Rules">[Societal Benchmarks](/Rules.aspx?ID=1130)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 124</row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
The following sections can help you establish certain truths about your world as a whole. From there, you can decide the details of specific cultural groups, including whether they deviate from these global standards.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<document level="2" id="rules-1131" />

<document level="2" id="rules-1132" />

name: Societal Benchmarks
